SEARCH
Package vhdlgenerator.generator

Class Port

java.lang.Object
vhdlgenerator.generator.Port
public class Port extends Object
this class hold the Port information about the VHDL code to write to the file.
Author:
DOUDOU DIAWARA

  • Constructor Details

    • Port

      public Port(String entity_name, String architecture_name, String generic_map, String input_port, String in_data_type, String output_port, String out_data_type, String code_implementation)
      Constructor for the interface of the VHDL code.
      Parameters:
      entity_name - the name of the entity interface
      architecture_name - the name architecture of the implementation
      generic_map - the DataWidth of the data type
      input_port - the input signals
      in_data_type - Data type of the input signals
      output_port - the output signals
      out_data_type - Data type of the output signals
      code_implementation - VHDL code to write to the file
